name: Lost Island+
description:
===INTRODUCTION===
A new game is released from the popular romance app, "Shall we date?" series!!
Free to play (in-app purchases)!! Shall we date?: Lost Island+ is now available!!

Zombies are roaming in an isolated island!? Blooming romance in an unusual setting!
Please enjoy the thrilling love story in the extreme situation far from your daily life.

===STORY===
New researcher (heroine) arrives at the beautiful island to do energy research. Soon after that, a series of mysterious deaths occurs around her… What she is going to witness is that unbelievable phenomenon of dead people...

===CHARACTERS===
How to deal with looming zombies...? Players will nature love with their favorite characters while overcoming numerous crises.

Ryo Tsuzuki "I'll teach you everything..."
Ren Nishimura "I think I love you..."
Lionel Saito "You love me, don't you?"

===FEATURES===
◆Advance the story with in-game missions.
◆Multiple endings with your choices along the story.
◆Enjoy decorating your avatar and room with fun items.
◆Collect Shell (in-game coins) by logging in and through training games, and challenge Slot that win you an item to advance the story and special avatar items.

=== HOW TO BUY COINS ===
Once the tutorial is cleared, you will see a Menu button at the bottom of the page,
Tap Menu > then tap Buy Coin, here you can buy Coins that can be used for all in-app items.

=== FACEBOOK ===
We've launched our Facebook page of “Shall we date?” series.
Please come and visit us!
